ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I really think your connection speed is playing a huge factor in this.  How the h*ll does a bard die 4 times in one night passing through outdoor zones?
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 1 Oct 1999, Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) wrote:
>
> 1. Leave freeport.
> Leave highpass and die in N.Karana.
> 2. Start over in Freeport.
> Leave highpass and die in N.Karana trying to get corpse.
> 3. Start over in Freeport.
> Leave highpass and die in N.Karana trying to get corpse.
> 4. Start over in Freeport.
> Killed by a guard for an unknown reason.
> 5. Camp bard and play cleric.
>
> That was 6+ hours in total. Over 5 of those hours
> were spent running naked across Antonica. I am

I really think your connection speed is playing a huge factor
in this. How the h*ll does a bard die 4 times in one night
passing through outdoor zones? I've only been killed 2 times
since April while just "passing through" an outdoor zone since
April - a puma that could keep up with me killed me in my
weakened state after I'd zoned from a random madman nuking me,
and the brownies in LFay nuked me before I could start moving.
All my other outdoor deaths have been combat related.

I do totally agree with your above argument for non-bards that
can't bind, but then, giving bards bind doesn't really help
them.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
